answers.author: Marcia Scott
answers.text:
Hi Timothy - 
Rural Sussex County, Delaware just adopted a new ordinance regarding wind turbines.  Here is the link to the press release with contact information to talk directly to administrators: http://www.sussexcountyde.gov/docs/pressreleases/2011/09/windmill.regs.09-13-11.pdf

author: Timothy McLean
text: I  am interested in hearing from administrators in rural communities regarding any ordinances that are on their books concerning wind turbines. Also, I am interested in hearing some of the rational behind the ordinance.
title: Wind Turbine Ordinance
